thread.title: Will the Presidio Trust pursue a 14-building hotel?
thread.title_full: Will the Presidio Trust pursue a 14-building hotel? - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Gary Widman
title: Will the Presidio Trust pursue a 14-building hotel?
text:
Photo: Jessica Christian, The Chronicle Noah Jang, 2, of San Francisco plays in the grass during an Off the Grid Picnic at the Presidio event earlier this year. Noah Jang, 2, of San Francisco plays in the grass during an Off the...
The appointed boards of the Presidio Trust have received praise for restorations (the Officers Club, the Presidio Inn) and criticism for advocating major construction (the Fisher contemporary art museum and the Lucas cultural arts museum, neither of which came to fruition) in or near the Main Post. The public now faces a new Main Post construction issue, begun under the former board but not yet addressed by the new board. Noah Jang, 2, of San Francisco plays in the grass during an Off the Grid Picnic at the Presidio event earlier this year. Noah Jang, 2, of San Francisco plays in the grass during an Off the...
The appointed boards of the Presidio Trust have received praise for restorations (the Officers Club, the Presidio Inn) and criticism for advocating major construction (the Fisher contemporary art museum and the Lucas cultural arts museum, neither of which came to fruition) in or near the Main Post. The public now faces a new Main Post construction issue, begun under the former board but not yet addressed by the new board.
